featured.name: Knix
featured.description: KNIX MicroFunctions is a serverless computing platform that combines container-based resource isolation with a lightweight execution model using processes to significantly improve resource efficiency and decrease the function startup latency. KNIX MicroFunctions works in Knative as well as bare metal or virtual machine-based environments.
